channel.title: Tips on David John Baker
channel.description: Recent content in Tips on David John Baker

item.title: Orgflow 6: Notes on Minutes and Communications
item.description: Being good at organization is a blessing and a curse. It’s a blessing as it allows you to feel more in control of what is coming on the horizon.

item.title: Tips on Scientific Writing
item.description: At the moment, I am providing a lot of feedback on graduate student writing and it feels like I see the same types of errors that I (and I know many others) made when they started scientific/academic writing.
